Package ev3dev.hardware.ports

This package includes a set of classes to manage Sensor & Motor Ports

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MotorPort
    Basic interface for EV3 motors ports.
    MotorPortBrickPi
    Basic interface for PiStorms motors ports.
    MotorPortPiStorms
    Basic interface for PiStorms motors ports.
    SensorPort
    Basic interface for EV3 sensors ports.
    SensorPortBrickPi
    Basic interface for BrickPi sensors ports.
    SensorPortPiStorms
    Basic interface for PiStorms sensors ports.

Package ev3dev.hardware.ports Description

This package includes a set of classes to manage Sensor & Motor Ports
